pullrequest.title: Delay handling SIGTERM until HDF5 files are closed

content.raw: We haven't seen any more runmanager crashes, and we've been hammering runmanger pretty hard with optimisation setting globals and compiling shots with `runmanager.remote`, so I suspect the version of runmanager that had the crash didn't have the fix for the deadlock mentioned above. So I'm merging this.

So I'm merging this.
